name: Windows App
intro: Get monitoring of Windows Events and server health. Find charts, alerts and Workspaces to give you a view on your Windows server estate.

name: Unix Operating Systems
intro: Monitor Unix, Solaris and OS X operating systems. Get insights on operating system KPIs with detailed charts and alerts

name: Cassandra
intro: Collect Cassandra connection, cache and performance metrics. Visualize and monitor your cassandra instances

name: MongoDB
intro: Monitor Mongo application logs, caches, tables and mongo server metrics

name: Mysql
intro: Monitor the health of mysql instances, track cache, buffers and slow queries

name: Visualize Collectd Metrics
intro: Aggregate collectd metrics across several hosts and visualize system health and performance metrics on custom Collectd Workspaces.

name: Apache Http Server
intro: Monitor Apache HTTP workers, bandwidth and connections

name: Nginx Web Server
intro: Monitor Nginx server health and track connections statistics

name: Java
intro: Monitor the JVM, java application logs and garbage collection. Visualize custom metrics through JMX

name: HAProxy
intro: Monitor the performance of your HAProxy web farm. Get a detailed view connections, requests and queues

name: Cisco ASA Routers
intro: Analyse Cisco ASA syslog messages, track and measure bandwidth usage and connection throughput and alert on suspicious traffic

name: Oracle Coherence Cache
intro: Monitor the performance of your caches, proxies and Coherence nodes

name: Docker
intro: Monitor and track Docker containers and application logs

name: Analyze Weblogs
intro: Visualize visitors, bandwidth and other metrics for your IIS,Apache and Nginx web logs. Provides support for common web log formats CLF,XLF and custom.

name: Docker
intro: Monitor Docker and process running in Docker containers. Visualize resource metrics and container life cycles
